botanique.title: botanical
botanique.text: Driven by our passion for cooking and especially the blending of flavors, we were eager to create an original and tasty menu using only plant-based and seasonal ingredients to offer our guests a bold and gourmet botanical gastronomy. With our three complementary backgrounds, and after several months of work, reflection, and above all fun and laughter—where French and Asian cuisines were our muses—Maora was born.

fusion.title: Fusion
fusion.text: With Maora, beyond delighting our customers’ palates, we wanted to offer a menu that respects both the environment and animal life.That's why we chose to use only plant-based, seasonal ingredients sourced as locally as possible.

about.title: Maora
about.text1: Driven by our passion for cooking and especially the blend of flavors, we aimed to create an original and tasty menu using only plant-based, seasonal ingredients, to offer our guests bold and gourmet botanical gastronomy. With our three complementary backgrounds, and after months of work, reflection — but above all fun and laughter — where French and Asian cuisines inspired us: Maora was born.
about.text2: With Maora, beyond delighting our clients' palates, we wanted to offer a menu that respects both the environment and animal welfare. That’s why we chose to use only plant-based, seasonal ingredients, harvested as locally as possible.

hours.title: Opening hours
hours.line1: Every day from 12:00 to 14:30 and from 18:30 to 22:00

bottom.slogan: From the future, for the present.
